title: Trump Media's Bitcoin Investment Plan Gets SEC Nod, Unlocking $2.3 Billion In Capital
description:
Trump Media and Technology Group’s (NASDAQ:DJT) Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) investment plan has received approval from the Securities and Exchange Commission, the company said Friday.
What Happened: The firm, majority-owned by President Donald Trump and which opera…
